name: Drone Manufacturers Alliance Europe
goal: The Drone Manufacturers Alliance Europe (DMAE) is formed by leading global drone manufacturers DJI, GoPro and Parrot. The DMAE is a coalition to help voice drone manufacturersâ€™ positions in Europe. To realise the economic potential of drones in Europe, DMAE is working towards an harmonised set of rules that facilitates the safe and secure uptake of drone operations. The secretariat of DMAE is run by GPLUS Europe.
euInitiatives:
-Review of EASA Basic Regulation
-EASA drone rules for the Open Category & Standard Scenarios
-SESAR working groups on U-Space
-European Commission's initiative on U-Space
